00014                     std::runtime_error(what) { }

00017     class Statement {
00018 
00019         public:
00020             Statement(const Parser *_parser, const std::string &_arg):
00021                 m_arg(_arg), m_parser(_parser) { }
00022             virtual bool execute();
00023 
00024         protected:
00025             const std::string &arg() { return m_arg; }
00026             const Parser *parser() { return m_parser; }
00027 
00028         private:
00029             std::string m_arg;
00030             const Parser *m_parser;
00031     };

00033     class BoolStatement: public Statement {
00034         public:
00035             BoolStatement (const Parser *p, const std::string &_arg);
00036             virtual bool execute() = 0;
00037 
00038         protected:
00039             bool getValue() { return m_bool; }
00040 
00041         private:
00042             bool m_bool;
00043     };
